tooltip: Select Sekaia, Fairy of Winds, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Sekaia focuses on improving the attacks of Ranged units.
Allows you to summon Sekaia, a Mage hero that summons the winds.
Hovering unit that attacks groups of enemies with Melee Splash Damage.
Attack Range of all Ranged units is increased.
Great Dragonfly Fairy attack now has increased range and deals Knockback damage to units.
